ModMetaData.name: Android tiers - TX Series
ModMetaData.author: aRandomKiwi, CrackaJack
ModMetaData.description:
Add a new serie of androids designed for infiltration missions, their slightly modified exoskeleton are covered with rubber skin / living tissues which prevent them to rust, have a better social impact and to be EMP/solar flare proof, he is however more flammable.
Version <color=#FFD800>1.0.4</color>
